name: Dungeonlands
description:
Hack and slash your way through hordes of skeletons and goblins! This is my first officially released game.  Made with the Godot game engine.

Note: This hasn't been tested on Linux or Mac, if it doesn't run or you encounter a bug, let me know in the comments!

Avg. playtime: 30 min - 1hr30min

Features:
  • 2 types of enemies
  • 6 increasingly difficult levels
  • Randomly generated level feature
  • Beautiful music
Credits

Game : Jorens Merenjanu (me)

Art: Pixel_Poem

Music: AVGVSTA

Sound effects: SubspaceAudio
